definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: We almost can overlook the whole London city through the window.
sentences.chinese: 通過窗戶，我們幾乎可以遠眺到整個倫敦城。

sentences.english: Overlooking by the window, enjoy270O seascape as much as you like.
sentences.chinese: 憑窗遠眺，270O無敵海景盡情收納。

sentences.english: Grand Mirage Resort is a beach resort with 309 rooms which most them overlooking to the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 在酒店，您可以遠眺美麗的山巒和印度洋的絕妙風光。

sentences.english: You can see as far as the coast.
sentences.chinese: 你可以極目遠眺，看見海岸。

sentences.english: Seen from the pagoda, the south foot of the Purple Mountain is a sea of trees.
sentences.chinese: 從這個塔上遠眺，紫金山南麓是樹的海洋。

sentences.english: Seen from a very high and faraway place, rising layers of mountain peaks make a magnificent scene.
sentences.chinese: 站在極處遠眺，層巒疊嶂的景色很是壯觀。

sentences.english: He looked afar to the beautiful hills and rivers.
sentences.chinese: 他極目遠眺美麗的河山。

sentences.english: The UNIL campus is located on the shores of Lake Geneva.
sentences.chinese: 洛桑大學坐落於日內瓦湖畔，遠眺阿爾卑斯山。

sentences.english: We looked out across the river, to the majestic Amu.
sentences.chinese: 我們遠眺向河，宏偉的阿姆河。

sentences.english: Back then, you can lightly smile, looked over.
sentences.chinese: 那時侯，你可以淡然一笑，極目遠眺。

sentences.english: I will overlook the inconveniences of the world.
sentences.chinese: 我將遠眺這世界的無奈。

sentences.english: If the weather were fine, more travellers can Corsica.
sentences.chinese: 如果天氣晴朗，更可以遠眺科西嘉島。

sentences.english: And, far off, Paris shrouded in smoke!
sentences.chinese: 極目遠眺，是雲霧籠罩下的巴黎。

sentences.english: The second floor also captures the water vistas with large panels of sliding doors that open the bedrooms to the outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 二樓大型滑動門使臥室敞向戶外，通過它能遠眺水景。

sentences.english: On the hillside, a two-story bungalow, overlooking the weird.
sentences.chinese: 山坡上，那所一層樓高的小平房，遠眺很詭異。

definition: to take in the whole scene at once/to have a panoramic view
to gaze afar/to look into the distance
as far as the eye can see (idiom)
to get a bird's-eye view/bird's-eye view/broad overview
